name: GaeanDigSiteVR
description:
Submitting for the sake of it! And to get to know itch io community :) This is sadly all I can wrap up in 2 days development.

Basically still just a mining(?) rock hitting and loot collecting simulator. Initially planned for each character to request specific items through puzzle player must complete, then warp to a different place. Basically like magic school bus on VR. Game ideas are very welcome!

Assets are currently from Google Poly and Kenny Free Assets. No sounds or effects yet :(

Controls: hit rock with pickaxe! press A or primary button to change right hand, press grip to teleport with left hand.
